title: Brand Identity Designer
description: Are you a creative thinker with a passion for crafting visually compelling brand identities? Join Diva Solutions as a Brand Identity Designer in a full-time hybrid position, allowing you to work remotely and from our Cairo office.
responsibilities: Develop and create innovative visual identities that align with clients' brand goals and values.
Design logos, color schemes, typography, and other visual elements that maintain brand consistency across all platforms.
Collaborate closely with the creative team to ensure visual assets meet project objectives and client expectations.
Conduct research on industry trends and competitor analysis to inform design decisions.
Present and communicate design concepts and rationale to internal teams and clients.
Adapt designs based on feedback and critique from team members and stakeholders.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks effectively to meet deadlines.
Stay updated on design trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve skills and approaches.
requirements: Proven experience as a Brand Identity Designer or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful brand identity projects.
Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign).
Solid understanding of branding principles, including visual hierarchy, typography, color theory, and composition.
Ability to work with luxury approach designs, delivering high-end, sophisticated visuals.
Excellent communication skills with the ability to present and articulate design concepts effectively.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a hybrid work environment.
Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work under tight deadlines.
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field is preferred.
benefits: Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
Hybrid work model allowing flexibility between remote work and office-based collaboration in Cairo.
Opportunities for professional growth and development through ongoing training and mentorship.
Join a dynamic and creative team that values innovation, creativity, and excellence.
application: To apply, send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter to career@thedivasolutions.com with the subject line 'Application for Brand Identity Designer - [Your Full Name]'.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Are you a creative thinker with a passion for crafting user-friendly and visually compelling digital experiences? Join Diva Solutions as a UI/UX Designer in a full-time hybrid position, allowing you to work remotely and from our Cairo office.
responsibilities: Develop and create innovative UI/UX designs that align with clients' brand goals and values.
Design user interfaces for websites, mobile applications, and other digital platforms.
Conduct user research and usability testing to inform design decisions.
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups to communicate design concepts.
Collaborate closely with the development and creative teams to ensure visual and functional design elements meet project objectives and client expectations.
Present and communicate design concepts and rationale to internal teams and clients.
Adapt designs based on feedback and critique from team members and stakeholders.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks effectively to meet deadlines.
Stay updated on design trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve skills and approaches.
requirements: Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful UI/UX design projects.
Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, XD), Sketch, and Figma.
Solid understanding of UX principles, including user research, information architecture, interaction design, and usability testing.
Ability to work with luxury approach designs, delivering high-end, sophisticated visuals.
Excellent communication skills with the ability to present and articulate design concepts effectively.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a hybrid work environment.
Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work under tight deadlines.
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or a related field is preferred.
benefits: Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
Hybrid work model allowing flexibility between remote work and office-based collaboration in Cairo.
Opportunities for professional growth and development through ongoing training and mentorship.
Join a dynamic and creative team that values innovation, creativity, and excellence.
application: To apply, send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter to career@thedivasolutions.com with the subject line 'Application for UI/UX Designer - [Your Full Name]'.

title: Front-end Developer
description: Are you a creative thinker with a passion for developing visually compelling and user-friendly web applications? Join Diva Solutions as a Front-end Developer in a full-time hybrid position, allowing you to work remotely and from our Cairo office.
responsibilities: Develop and create innovative web applications that align with clients' brand goals and values.
Implement responsive designs using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.
Collaborate closely with the design and back-end development teams to ensure visual and functional design elements meet project objectives and client expectations.
Optimize web applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Conduct testing and debugging to ensure web applications function seamlessly across different devices and browsers.
Present and communicate development concepts and rationale to internal teams and clients.
Adapt code based on feedback and critique from team members and stakeholders.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks effectively to meet deadlines.
Stay updated on web development trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve skills and approaches.
requirements: Proven experience as a Front-end Developer or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful web development projects.
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and React is a MUST.
Experience with version control systems like Git.
Solid understanding of UX/UI principles and ability to work with luxury approach designs, delivering high-end, sophisticated visuals.
Excellent communication skills with the ability to present and articulate development concepts effectively.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a hybrid work environment.
Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work under tight deadlines.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field is preferred.
benefits: Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
Hybrid work model allowing flexibility between remote work and office-based collaboration in Cairo.
Opportunities for professional growth and development through ongoing training and mentorship.
Join a dynamic and creative team that values innovation, creativity, and excellence.
application: To apply, send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter to career@thedivasolutions.com with the subject line 'Application for Front-end Developer - [Your Full Name]'.

title: Back-end Developer
description: Are you a creative thinker with a passion for building robust and scalable web applications? Join Diva Solutions as a Back-end Developer in a full-time hybrid position, allowing you to work remotely and from our Cairo office.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end.
Design and implement database structures that are scalable and secure.
Integrate front-end elements built by your colleagues into the application.
Collaborate closely with front-end developers and other team members to establish objectives and design more functional, cohesive codes to enhance the user experience.
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Conduct testing and debugging to ensure a smooth user experience and application functionality.
Present and communicate development concepts and rationale to internal teams and clients.
Adapt code based on feedback and critique from team members and stakeholders.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks effectively to meet deadlines.
Stay updated on back-end development trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve skills and approaches.
requirements: Proven experience as a Back-end Developer or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful web development projects.
Proficiency in server-side languages such as Node.js, PHP, or .NET is a MUST.
Experience with database management systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or similar.
Solid understanding of RESTful APIs, microservices architecture, and web security standards.
Familiarity with cloud services such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure.
Excellent communication skills with the ability to present and articulate development concepts effectively.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a hybrid work environment.
Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work under tight deadlines.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field is preferred.
benefits: Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
Hybrid work model allowing flexibility between remote work and office-based collaboration in Cairo.
Opportunities for professional growth and development through ongoing training and mentorship.
Join a dynamic and creative team that values innovation, creativity, and excellence.
application: To apply, send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter to career@thedivasolutions.com with the subject line 'Application for Back-end Developer - [Your Full Name]'.

responsibilities: Develop and implement innovative brand strategies that align with clients' goals and values.

Adapt strategies based on feedback and critique from team members and stakeholders.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks effectively to meet deadlines.
Stay updated on branding trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve skills and approaches.

benefits: Competitive salary commensurate with experience.

Manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks effectively to meet deadlines.
Stay updated on design trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve skills and approaches.

Bachelor's degree in Product Design, Industrial Design, or a related field is preferred.
benefits: Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
Hybrid work model allowing flexibility between remote work and office-based collaboration in Cairo.
Opportunities for professional growth and development through ongoing training and mentorship.
Join a dynamic and creative team that values innovation, creativity, and excellence.
application: To apply or for more information, please contact us at career@thedivasolutions.com.
